52.6392	-48.1172	-10.5489	5.8814	1.1456
0.0001	-0.0000	-0.0000	-0.0010	1.0010
-0.0527	0.0482	0.0106	0.9961	-0.0022

Solution using [A] \ [d] * 100
21.0528	4.2457	4.2980	70.4011	0.0024

Solution using [A]^-1 * [d] * 100
21.0528	4.2457	4.2980	70.4011	0.0024

Based on the results from Vendor A and Vendor B (Exercise 2 and 3 respectively, I would purchase from Vendor B.
This is because Vendor Bs alloy scraps and ferrochrome composition create a solution that requires a negative amount
of iron. This implies that the total amount of other material excluding iron would exceed 100 kg, the desired amount.
